participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and passionate about her music, Emily often expresses herself through her art.
participant_1.background: my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i am a musician and hope to make it big some day. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my parents are not very supportive of my dream.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and socially aware, Jordan enjoys discussing various topics and advocating for causes they believe in.
participant_2.background: i have solar panels on my roof. i buy only organic food products. i spend a lot of time browsing the internet. i love social media especially twitter. i am a feminist.

content.text: good luck to you with the music performance
